entry.title: Friday: Chance of showers. High 12. POP 30%
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending this morning then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming southwest 20 near noon. High 12. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM PDT Friday 7 April 2023
